title: Texture Palettes
description: Extracted per-texture palette/group data used by recolor tooling. Each item defines a palette of colors associated with a specific texture. These palettes can be used for recoloring textures in various materials or models. The schema ensures that each palette has a unique identifier, a reference to the texture file, and a list of colors in RGBA hex format. RGBA hex colors are sorted in ascending order based on their alpha values to facilitate efficient processing.

colors.description: List of colors in 8-digit RGBA hex format.

metadata.description: Optional arbitrary metadata for this palette.
